key_risks: Financial underperformance and downward revision of revenue and earnings forecasts
Supply chain disruptions affecting critical components like batteries and semiconductors
Dependence on government policies and incentives for renewable energy and EV adoption
Intense competition in EV charging and energy storage markets
Scalability challenges in meeting growing demand while maintaining quality
controversies: Stock price drop of nearly 80% due to disappointing growth and operational challenges
Delays in energy storage deals and slowing EV charging sales
environmental_issues: None identified; company demonstrates strong commitment to sustainability and carbon footprint reduction
social_issues: None identified; company actively promotes diversity and inclusion through formal policies and partnerships
governance_issues: None identified; company maintains ISO 45001 certification for occupational health and safety
